title: How to change my Voiceovers
body: How to change like the "30 seconds to minions spawn" voiceover into Chinese. Plz. Me no habla espanol. :)

replies.body:
I'd be pretty careful with using any 3rd party program that can alter the game files. 

With that being said, [**Riot Draggles mentioned over here**](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/NzaqEm3e/d/V361v6AO?comment=0013) that this type of program is not bannable. On that note, things can change and you never know 100% what kind of program you're getting.
Doesn't work for me, says Fatal Error: Download Location is empty.

There is a 3rd party program that can do this for you.
Be sure to read up on the riot article about this before you go ahead.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt

The voice changer is allowed and you can find it here: https://lexwah.com/lvoc/

Personally I adore Russian Thresh and actually use the entire Russian pack on my PC.
